text: David John Rolfe (26 June 1964 - 7 January 2015) was an Australian swimmer and Paralympian. He won a bronze medal at the 2000 Summer Paralympics in the Men's 4x100 m Medley 34 pts event in Sydney. Rolfe was born in Inverell, New South Wales. He was married with one child and lived on the Gold Coast in Queensland. Rolfe died from complications relating to heart surgery on 7 January 2015 on the Gold Coast. He was 50. ==References== Category:2015 deaths Category:1964 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Australia Category:Australian swimmers Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: David Rolfe (swimmer)
